_aChangeLog.text: Replaced some dev_ textures with realistic ones
Changed lighting indoors
Changed lighting + skybox outdoors
Removed Special Day 1
Tweaked secret Special Day
Special days now have a 4 round cooldown system. Have fun!
Replaced the FFA arena with a new one
Killhouse entrance doors have a solid structure now
Forklift now *should* properly stop when a player stops controlling it
Fixed spleef having a duplicate row spawn
Race final and 3rd final obstacles made easier
Added more targets to Shooting Range
Vents now have 72 HU tall walls instead of 64 HU
Streamlined Juggernaut secret activation method
Moved snowman secret entirely to football. Aim for the head
Tweaked secret songs including quality, activation method and replacing 1 song with another
Many other minor tweaks including texturing certain parts, removing stuff, adding small details, etc
Changed lighting to daytime
-Adjusted lighting in outside parts of the map
Special days - several tweaks
-SD will always be unlocked for the first 15 seconds until it is activated, then all of them are locked for the rest of the map
-Special day n.3 - adjusted the fog colour
-Special day n.2 - changed the round-start value of sv_friction to 4
-Secret special day - some tweaks
Removed falling snow due to working only half the time
Adjusted snow on the ground
Football - adjusted the goals and (hopefully) fixed the big ball texture
Disco corridor - raised the height of the wall next to the crate stack, added a railing on the nearby roof
Pool - several tweaks
-Cleaned the snow off the glass roof
-Made the roof ramp steeper
-Increased the height of the jump platform
-Added more detail
-Bomb diving - bombs are now located closer to the corner
-Spleef - Increased platform size from 64 to 72, adjusted arena size, implemented an experimental spawning system
Adjusted some of the cell physics props to be server-side
Juggernaut - shield power-up side/up cover decreased by half

_sText:
A little JailBreak map I had worked on and off for 1.5 years.
Has snow around the map, so I guess it is winter themed. There are some secrets around the map, including special songs.

Games:
-Football
-Pool ( Jumping, Air course, Bomb diving )
-Colours
-Killhouse ( COD4 style )
-Race ( Long jump is quite hard without sv_accelerate 100 or above )
-Hot Potato
-Underground ( Forklift, Shooting range, Deathball, Wipeout, FFA, Spleef )

Disco song list:
Yakuza 0 - Friday Night
Usher - More
Sonic Palms - On The Beach
Avicii - Levels
Shingo Nakamura - Morning Sun
Camellia - Body F10ating in the Zero Gravity Space
Camellia - D:For The Delta

Special days:
-Low friction
-???
-Secret

Special thanks to : nyronic ( dev textures ), JasperCarmak( skybox ), Doctor waffles AKA Daan ( huge inspiration, creator of jb_carceris )
